wape.name: Wrapped APE
wape.note: Use WAPE for ERC-20 APE payments on ApeChain

ape_native.name: APE
ape_native.note: Native APE is used for gas, WAPE is the ERC-20 wrapper

changes: Native APE payments via msg.value (no ERC-20 approval needed)
Fee calculation uses requiredAPE instead of msg.value
purchaseBalls() is now payable
Added accumulatedAPEFees tracking
Added withdrawAPEFees() and withdrawAllAPE() functions
Fixed division by zero in calculateAPEAmount() when apePriceUSD is 0
Default to $0.64 APE price (64000000 in 8 decimals) if not set
APE price set to 64000000 ($0.64)
Unified payments: APE auto-swaps to USDC.e via Camelot DEX
3% fees accumulated in USDC.e (accumulatedUSDCFees)
97% revenue auto-sent to SlabNFTManager.depositRevenue()
SlabNFTManager.checkAndPurchaseNFT() called after each deposit
Added withdrawUSDCFees() for owner to withdraw USDC.e fees
Configurable swap slippage (default 1%)
SlabNFTManager set to 0xbbdfa19f9719f9d9348F494E07E0baB96A85AA71
Replaced POP VRNG with Pyth Entropy for randomness (no whitelist required)
throwBall() now requires msg.value to cover Entropy fee (~0.073 APE)
spawnPokemon() now requires msg.value to cover Entropy fee
New getThrowFee() view function to query current fee
entropyCallback() replaces randomNumberCallback() for VRNG results
Added awardNFTToWinnerWithRandomness(winner, randomNumber) for random NFT selection
Uses (randomNumber >> 128) % inventorySize for unbiased index selection
O(1) removal via swap-and-pop pattern in _removeFromInventoryAtIndex()
New NFTAwardedWithRandomness event with selectedIndex and inventorySize
Backwards compatible: awardNFTToWinner() (FIFO) still works
Random NFT selection using Pyth Entropy random number
Calls SlabNFTManager.awardNFTToWinnerWithRandomness() instead of awardNFTToWinner()
Reuses same random number from catch determination (no extra Entropy fee)
Uses different entropy bits: low 128 bits for catch rate, high 128 bits for NFT index
Formula: (randomNumber >> 128) % inventorySize for unbiased selection
APE reserve management for Entropy fees (depositAPEReserve, apeReserve)
Auto-purchase loop in checkAndPurchaseNFT() (until 20 NFTs OR funds depleted)
Pyth Entropy integration for random NFT selection
APEReserveDeposited event when APE received
AutoPurchaseLoopCompleted event when loop completes
New revenue split: 0.5% APE to PokeballGame, 0.5% APE to SlabNFTManager
New revenue split: 96% USDC.e to NFT pool, 3% USDC.e to treasury
Gasless throws via throwBallFor() meta-transaction function
APE reserve management (totalAPEReserve, depositAPEReserve)
USDC to APE swap function for USDC.e purchases to fund reserves
Nonce tracking for replay protection (playerThrowNonces)
Relayer authorization system (onlyRelayerOrOwner)
repositionPokemon(slot, newX, newY) - Move existing Pokemon without despawning
despawnPokemon(slot) - Remove Pokemon from a slot
maxActivePokemon - Owner-configurable soft cap on active spawns (max 20)
setMaxActivePokemon(newMax) - Adjust spawn density at runtime
getEffectiveMaxActivePokemon() - View current effective max
PokemonRepositioned, PokemonDespawned, MaxActivePokemonUpdated events
SlotNotOccupied, InvalidCoordinate, MaxActivePokemonExceeded, InvalidMaxActivePokemon errors
